00128 TeleopSinkTwistNode::TeleopSinkTwistNode() :
00129   mTeleopTopic(PARAM_DEFAULT_TELEOP_TOPIC),
00130   mTwistTopic(PARAM_DEFAULT_TWIST_TOPIC),
00131   mHasLinX(PARAM_DEFAULT_HAS_LIN_X),
00132   mHasLinY(PARAM_DEFAULT_HAS_LIN_Y),
00133   mHasLinZ(PARAM_DEFAULT_HAS_LIN_Z),
00134   mHasRotX(PARAM_DEFAULT_HAS_ROT_X),
00135   mHasRotY(PARAM_DEFAULT_HAS_ROT_Y),
00136   mHasRotZ(PARAM_DEFAULT_HAS_ROT_Z),
00137   mMinLinX(PARAM_DEFAULT_MIN_LIN_X),
00138   mMinLinY(PARAM_DEFAULT_MIN_LIN_Y),
00139   mMinLinZ(PARAM_DEFAULT_MIN_LIN_Z),
00140   mMinRotX(PARAM_DEFAULT_MIN_ROT_X),
00141   mMinRotY(PARAM_DEFAULT_MIN_ROT_Y),
00142   mMinRotZ(PARAM_DEFAULT_MIN_ROT_Z),
00143   mMaxLinX(PARAM_DEFAULT_MAX_LIN_X),
00144   mMaxLinY(PARAM_DEFAULT_MAX_LIN_Y),
00145   mMaxLinZ(PARAM_DEFAULT_MAX_LIN_Z),
00146   mMaxRotX(PARAM_DEFAULT_MAX_ROT_X),
00147   mMaxRotY(PARAM_DEFAULT_MAX_ROT_Y),
00148   mMaxRotZ(PARAM_DEFAULT_MAX_ROT_Z),
00149   mQuadraticLinX(PARAM_DEFAULT_QUADRATIC_LIN_X),
00150   mQuadraticLinY(PARAM_DEFAULT_QUADRATIC_LIN_Y),
00151   mQuadraticLinZ(PARAM_DEFAULT_QUADRATIC_LIN_Z),
00152   mQuadraticRotX(PARAM_DEFAULT_QUADRATIC_ROT_X),
00153   mQuadraticRotY(PARAM_DEFAULT_QUADRATIC_ROT_Y),
00154   mQuadraticRotZ(PARAM_DEFAULT_QUADRATIC_ROT_Z),
00155   mThrottleLinX(PARAM_DEFAULT_THROTTLE_LIN_X),
00156   mThrottleLinY(PARAM_DEFAULT_THROTTLE_LIN_Y),
00157   mThrottleLinZ(PARAM_DEFAULT_THROTTLE_LIN_Z),
00158   mThrottleRotX(PARAM_DEFAULT_THROTTLE_ROT_X),
00159   mThrottleRotY(PARAM_DEFAULT_THROTTLE_ROT_Y),
00160   mThrottleRotZ(PARAM_DEFAULT_THROTTLE_ROT_Z),
00161   mSpinner(NULL),
00162   mIsInitialised(false) {
00163 
00164   //Sanity checks: min <= max, 0 <= max, 0 >= min
00165   if (mMinLinX > mMaxLinX || 0 > mMaxLinX || 0 < mMinLinX) {
00166     ROS_WARN("TeleopSinkTwistCallbackRos: invalid lin X min and/or max values, resetting both to defaults");
00167     mMaxLinX = PARAM_DEFAULT_MAX_LIN_X;
00168     mMinLinX = PARAM_DEFAULT_MIN_LIN_X;
00169   }
00170   if (mMinLinY > mMaxLinY || 0 > mMaxLinY || 0 < mMinLinY) {
00171     ROS_WARN("TeleopSinkTwistCallbackRos: invalid lin Y min and/or max values, resetting both to defaults");
00172     mMaxLinY = PARAM_DEFAULT_MAX_LIN_Y;
00173     mMinLinY = PARAM_DEFAULT_MIN_LIN_Y;
00174   }
00175   if (mMinLinZ > mMaxLinZ || 0 > mMaxLinZ || 0 < mMinLinZ) {
00176     ROS_WARN("TeleopSinkTwistCallbackRos: invalid lin Z min and/or max values, resetting both to defaults");
00177     mMaxLinZ = PARAM_DEFAULT_MAX_LIN_Z;
00178     mMinLinZ = PARAM_DEFAULT_MIN_LIN_Z;
00179   }
00180   if (mMinRotX > mMaxRotX || 0 > mMaxRotX || 0 < mMinRotX) {
00181     ROS_WARN("TeleopSinkTwistCallbackRos: invalid rot X min and/or max values, resetting both to defaults");
00182     mMaxRotX = PARAM_DEFAULT_MAX_ROT_X;
00183     mMinRotX = PARAM_DEFAULT_MIN_ROT_X;
00184   }
00185   if (mMinRotY > mMaxRotY || 0 > mMaxRotY || 0 < mMinRotY) {
00186     ROS_WARN("TeleopSinkTwistCallbackRos: invalid rot Y min and/or max values, resetting both to defaults");
00187     mMaxRotY = PARAM_DEFAULT_MAX_ROT_Y;
00188     mMinRotY = PARAM_DEFAULT_MIN_ROT_Y;
00189   }
00190   if (mMinRotZ > mMaxRotZ || 0 > mMaxRotZ || 0 < mMinRotZ) {
00191     ROS_WARN("TeleopSinkTwistCallbackRos: invalid rot Z min and/or max values, resetting both to defaults");
00192     mMaxRotZ = PARAM_DEFAULT_MAX_ROT_Z;
00193     mMinRotZ = PARAM_DEFAULT_MIN_ROT_Z;
00194   }
00195 }
00196 //=============================================================================
00197 TeleopSinkTwistNode::~TeleopSinkTwistNode() {
00198   //Shutdown (should always succeed)
00199   if (!shutdown()) {
00200     ROS_WARN("TeleopSinkTwistNode::~TeleopSinkTwistNode: ignoring error in shutdown");
00201   }
00202 }
00203 //=============================================================================
00204 bool TeleopSinkTwistNode::init(int argc, char** argv, std::string nodeName, uint32_t rosInitOptions) {
00205   //Lock access to is initialised
00206   boost::lock_guard<boost::recursive_mutex> isInitialisedLock(mIsInitialisedMutex);
00207 
00208   //If already initialised shutdown first (shutdown should always succeed)
00209   if (mIsInitialised && !shutdown()) {
00210     ROS_WARN("TeleopSinkTwistNode::init: ignoring error in shutdown()");
00211   }
00212 
00213   //Init node
00214   try {
00215     ros::init(argc, argv, nodeName, rosInitOptions);
00216   } catch(ros::InvalidNodeNameException& e) {
00217     ROS_ERROR("TeleopSinkTwistNode::init: error initialising node");
00218     return false;
00219   }
00220 
00221   //Start node manually to avoid node shutdown when last node handle is destroyed
00222   ros::start();
00223 
00224   //Init parameters
00225   try {
00226     //Create private node handle for parameters
00227     ros::NodeHandle nodeHandlePrivate("~");
00228 
00229     //Read parameters and/or set default values
00230     nodeHandlePrivate.param(PARAM_KEY_TELEOP_TOPIC,    mTeleopTopic,   nodeName + "/" + PARAM_DEFAULT_TELEOP_TOPIC);
00231     nodeHandlePrivate.param(PARAM_KEY_TWIST_TOPIC,     mTwistTopic,    nodeName + "/" + PARAM_DEFAULT_TWIST_TOPIC);
00232     nodeHandlePrivate.param(PARAM_KEY_HAS_LIN_X,       mHasLinX,       PARAM_DEFAULT_HAS_LIN_X);
00233     nodeHandlePrivate.param(PARAM_KEY_HAS_LIN_Y,       mHasLinY,       PARAM_DEFAULT_HAS_LIN_Y);
00234     nodeHandlePrivate.param(PARAM_KEY_HAS_LIN_Z,       mHasLinZ,       PARAM_DEFAULT_HAS_LIN_Z);
00235     nodeHandlePrivate.param(PARAM_KEY_HAS_ROT_X,       mHasRotX,       PARAM_DEFAULT_HAS_ROT_X);
00236     nodeHandlePrivate.param(PARAM_KEY_HAS_ROT_Y,       mHasRotY,       PARAM_DEFAULT_HAS_ROT_Y);
00237     nodeHandlePrivate.param(PARAM_KEY_HAS_ROT_Z,       mHasRotZ,       PARAM_DEFAULT_HAS_ROT_Z);
00238     nodeHandlePrivate.param(PARAM_KEY_MIN_LIN_X,       mMinLinX,       PARAM_DEFAULT_MIN_LIN_X);
00239     nodeHandlePrivate.param(PARAM_KEY_MIN_LIN_Y,       mMinLinY,       PARAM_DEFAULT_MIN_LIN_Y);
00240     nodeHandlePrivate.param(PARAM_KEY_MIN_LIN_Z,       mMinLinZ,       PARAM_DEFAULT_MIN_LIN_Z);
00241     nodeHandlePrivate.param(PARAM_KEY_MIN_ROT_X,       mMinRotX,       PARAM_DEFAULT_MIN_ROT_X);
00242     nodeHandlePrivate.param(PARAM_KEY_MIN_ROT_Y,       mMinRotY,       PARAM_DEFAULT_MIN_ROT_Y);
00243     nodeHandlePrivate.param(PARAM_KEY_MIN_ROT_Z,       mMinRotZ,       PARAM_DEFAULT_MIN_ROT_Z);
00244     nodeHandlePrivate.param(PARAM_KEY_MAX_LIN_X,       mMaxLinX,       PARAM_DEFAULT_MAX_LIN_X);
00245     nodeHandlePrivate.param(PARAM_KEY_MAX_LIN_Y,       mMaxLinY,       PARAM_DEFAULT_MAX_LIN_Y);
00246     nodeHandlePrivate.param(PARAM_KEY_MAX_LIN_Z,       mMaxLinZ,       PARAM_DEFAULT_MAX_LIN_Z);
00247     nodeHandlePrivate.param(PARAM_KEY_MAX_ROT_X,       mMaxRotX,       PARAM_DEFAULT_MAX_ROT_X);
00248     nodeHandlePrivate.param(PARAM_KEY_MAX_ROT_Y,       mMaxRotY,       PARAM_DEFAULT_MAX_ROT_Y);
00249     nodeHandlePrivate.param(PARAM_KEY_MAX_ROT_Z,       mMaxRotZ,       PARAM_DEFAULT_MAX_ROT_Z);
00250     nodeHandlePrivate.param(PARAM_KEY_QUADRATIC_LIN_X, mQuadraticLinX, PARAM_DEFAULT_QUADRATIC_LIN_X);
00251     nodeHandlePrivate.param(PARAM_KEY_QUADRATIC_LIN_Y, mQuadraticLinY, PARAM_DEFAULT_QUADRATIC_LIN_Y);
00252     nodeHandlePrivate.param(PARAM_KEY_QUADRATIC_LIN_Z, mQuadraticLinZ, PARAM_DEFAULT_QUADRATIC_LIN_Z);
00253     nodeHandlePrivate.param(PARAM_KEY_QUADRATIC_ROT_X, mQuadraticRotX, PARAM_DEFAULT_QUADRATIC_ROT_X);
00254     nodeHandlePrivate.param(PARAM_KEY_QUADRATIC_ROT_Y, mQuadraticRotY, PARAM_DEFAULT_QUADRATIC_ROT_Y);
00255     nodeHandlePrivate.param(PARAM_KEY_QUADRATIC_ROT_Z, mQuadraticRotZ, PARAM_DEFAULT_QUADRATIC_ROT_Z);
00256     nodeHandlePrivate.param(PARAM_KEY_THROTTLE_LIN_X,  mThrottleLinX,  PARAM_DEFAULT_THROTTLE_LIN_X);
00257     nodeHandlePrivate.param(PARAM_KEY_THROTTLE_LIN_Y,  mThrottleLinY,  PARAM_DEFAULT_THROTTLE_LIN_Y);
00258     nodeHandlePrivate.param(PARAM_KEY_THROTTLE_LIN_Z,  mThrottleLinZ,  PARAM_DEFAULT_THROTTLE_LIN_Z);
00259     nodeHandlePrivate.param(PARAM_KEY_THROTTLE_ROT_X,  mThrottleRotX,  PARAM_DEFAULT_THROTTLE_ROT_X);
00260     nodeHandlePrivate.param(PARAM_KEY_THROTTLE_ROT_Y,  mThrottleRotY,  PARAM_DEFAULT_THROTTLE_ROT_Y);
00261     nodeHandlePrivate.param(PARAM_KEY_THROTTLE_ROT_Z,  mThrottleRotZ,  PARAM_DEFAULT_THROTTLE_ROT_Z);
00262 
00263     //Advertise all parameters to allow introspection
00264     nodeHandlePrivate.setParam(PARAM_KEY_TELEOP_TOPIC,    mTeleopTopic);
00265     nodeHandlePrivate.setParam(PARAM_KEY_TWIST_TOPIC,     mTwistTopic);
00266     nodeHandlePrivate.setParam(PARAM_KEY_HAS_LIN_X,       mHasLinX);
00267     nodeHandlePrivate.setParam(PARAM_KEY_HAS_LIN_Y,       mHasLinY);
00268     nodeHandlePrivate.setParam(PARAM_KEY_HAS_LIN_Z,       mHasLinZ);
00269     nodeHandlePrivate.setParam(PARAM_KEY_HAS_ROT_X,       mHasRotX);
00270     nodeHandlePrivate.setParam(PARAM_KEY_HAS_ROT_Y,       mHasRotY);
00271     nodeHandlePrivate.setParam(PARAM_KEY_HAS_ROT_Z,       mHasRotZ);
00272     nodeHandlePrivate.setParam(PARAM_KEY_MIN_LIN_X,       mMinLinX);
00273     nodeHandlePrivate.setParam(PARAM_KEY_MIN_LIN_Y,       mMinLinY);
00274     nodeHandlePrivate.setParam(PARAM_KEY_MIN_LIN_Z,       mMinLinZ);
00275     nodeHandlePrivate.setParam(PARAM_KEY_MIN_ROT_X,       mMinRotX);
00276     nodeHandlePrivate.setParam(PARAM_KEY_MIN_ROT_Y,       mMinRotY);
00277     nodeHandlePrivate.setParam(PARAM_KEY_MIN_ROT_Z,       mMinRotZ);
00278     nodeHandlePrivate.setParam(PARAM_KEY_MAX_LIN_X,       mMaxLinX);
00279     nodeHandlePrivate.setParam(PARAM_KEY_MAX_LIN_Y,       mMaxLinY);
00280     nodeHandlePrivate.setParam(PARAM_KEY_MAX_LIN_Z,       mMaxLinZ);
00281     nodeHandlePrivate.setParam(PARAM_KEY_MAX_ROT_X,       mMaxRotX);
00282     nodeHandlePrivate.setParam(PARAM_KEY_MAX_ROT_Y,       mMaxRotY);
00283     nodeHandlePrivate.setParam(PARAM_KEY_MAX_ROT_Z,       mMaxRotZ);
00284     nodeHandlePrivate.setParam(PARAM_KEY_QUADRATIC_LIN_X, mQuadraticLinX);
00285     nodeHandlePrivate.setParam(PARAM_KEY_QUADRATIC_LIN_Y, mQuadraticLinY);
00286     nodeHandlePrivate.setParam(PARAM_KEY_QUADRATIC_LIN_Z, mQuadraticLinZ);
00287     nodeHandlePrivate.setParam(PARAM_KEY_QUADRATIC_ROT_X, mQuadraticRotX);
00288     nodeHandlePrivate.setParam(PARAM_KEY_QUADRATIC_ROT_Y, mQuadraticRotY);
00289     nodeHandlePrivate.setParam(PARAM_KEY_QUADRATIC_ROT_Z, mQuadraticRotZ);
00290     nodeHandlePrivate.setParam(PARAM_KEY_THROTTLE_LIN_X,  mThrottleLinX);
00291     nodeHandlePrivate.setParam(PARAM_KEY_THROTTLE_LIN_Y,  mThrottleLinY);
00292     nodeHandlePrivate.setParam(PARAM_KEY_THROTTLE_LIN_Z,  mThrottleLinZ);
00293     nodeHandlePrivate.setParam(PARAM_KEY_THROTTLE_ROT_X,  mThrottleRotX);
00294     nodeHandlePrivate.setParam(PARAM_KEY_THROTTLE_ROT_Y,  mThrottleRotY);
00295     nodeHandlePrivate.setParam(PARAM_KEY_THROTTLE_ROT_Z,  mThrottleRotZ);
00296   } catch (ros::InvalidNameException& e) {
00297     ROS_ERROR("TeleopSinkTwistNode::init: error initialising parameters");
00298     ros::shutdown();
00299     return false;
00300   }
00301 
00302   //Create publisher and subscriber
00303   try {
00304     //Create relative node handle for topics
00305     ros::NodeHandle nodeHandleRelative = ros::NodeHandle();
00306 
00307     //Create publisher with buffer size set to 1 and latching on.  The publisher
00308     //should basically just always contain the latest state.
00309     mPublisher = nodeHandleRelative.advertise<geometry_msgs::Twist>(mTwistTopic, 1, true);
00310 
00311     //Subscribe to teleop topic
00312     mSubscriber = nodeHandleRelative.subscribe(mTeleopTopic, 1, &TeleopSinkTwistNode::updated, this);
00313   } catch (ros::InvalidNameException& e) {
00314     ROS_ERROR("TeleopSinkTwistNode::init: error during topic registration (InvalidNameException)");
00315     ros::shutdown();
00316     return false;
00317   } catch (ros::ConflictingSubscriptionException& e) {
00318     ROS_ERROR("TeleopSinkTwistNode::init: error during topic registration (ConflictingSubscriptionException)");
00319     ros::shutdown();
00320     return false;
00321   }
00322 
00323   //Create and start single-threaded asynchronous spinner to handle incoming
00324   //ROS messages via our sole subscriber.  Use only one thread, since the
00325   //callback method is not thread-safe.
00326   mSpinner = new ros::AsyncSpinner(1);
00327   mSpinner->start();
00328 
00329   //Update init done flag
00330   mIsInitialised = true;
00331 
00332   //Return result
00333   return true;
00334 }
00335 //=============================================================================
00336 bool TeleopSinkTwistNode::shutdown() {
00337   //Lock access to is initialised
00338   boost::lock_guard<boost::recursive_mutex> isInitialisedLock(mIsInitialisedMutex);
00339 
00340   //Check if done
00341   if (!mIsInitialised) {
00342     return true;
00343   }
00344 
00345   //Stop the subscriber so we don't get any more teleop events
00346   mSubscriber.shutdown();
00347 
00348   //Delete the spinner
00349   delete mSpinner;
00350 
00351   //Zero message
00352   mTwistMsg.linear.x = 0.0;
00353   mTwistMsg.linear.y = 0.0;
00354   mTwistMsg.linear.z = 0.0;
00355   mTwistMsg.angular.x = 0.0;
00356   mTwistMsg.angular.y = 0.0;
00357   mTwistMsg.angular.z = 0.0;
00358 
00359   //Publish zero message
00360   mPublisher.publish(mTwistMsg);
00361 
00362   //Sleep a bit to allow zero message to be published before node is shutdown.
00363   //Use boost thread sleep rather than ROS sleep since ROS sleep may try to use
00364   //a simulated clock, which may be stopped.
00365   boost::this_thread::sleep(boost::posix_time::milliseconds(500));
00366 
00367   //Shutdown node
00368   ros::shutdown();
00369 
00370   //Set init done flag
00371   mIsInitialised = false;
00372 
00373   //Return result
00374   return true;
00375 }
00376 //=============================================================================
00377 void TeleopSinkTwistNode::updated(const teleop_msgs::State& teleopStateMsg) {
00378   //Convert teleop state message to twist message and publish it
00379   if (teleopStateToTwist(&teleopStateMsg, &mTwistMsg)) {
00380     mPublisher.publish(mTwistMsg);
00381   } else {
00382     ROS_WARN("updated: ignoring problem converting teleop state to twist");
00383   }
00384 }
00385 //=============================================================================
00386 bool TeleopSinkTwistNode::teleopStateToTwist(const teleop_msgs::State* const teleopStateMsg,
00387                                              geometry_msgs::Twist* const twistMsg) {
00388   //Sanity check parameters
00389   if (NULL == teleopStateMsg || NULL == twistMsg) {
00390     ROS_ERROR("teleopStateToTwist: NULL parameter");
00391     return false;
00392   }
00393 
00394   //Get indices for each relevant axis in teleop state
00395   int indexLinX = -1;
00396   int indexLinY = -1;
00397   int indexLinZ = -1;
00398   int indexRotX = -1;
00399   int indexRotY = -1;
00400   int indexRotZ = -1;
00401   int indexThrottle = -1;
00402   for (size_t i = 0; i < teleopStateMsg->axes.size(); i++) {
00403     switch (teleopStateMsg->axes[i].type) {
00404       case TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_LIN_X:    indexLinX = i;     break;
00405       case TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_LIN_Y:    indexLinY = i;     break;
00406       case TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_LIN_Z:    indexLinZ = i;     break;
00407       case TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_ROT_X:    indexRotX = i;     break;
00408       case TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_ROT_Y:    indexRotY = i;     break;
00409       case TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_ROT_Z:    indexRotZ = i;     break;
00410       case TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_THROTTLE: indexThrottle = i; break;
00411       default:
00412         //Ignore other axes
00413         break;
00414     }
00415   }
00416 
00417   //Find throttle value
00418   double throttle = 1.0;
00419   if (-1 != indexThrottle) {
00420     throttle = teleopStateMsg->axes[indexThrottle].value;
00421   }
00422 
00423   //Set applicable twist message values for each axis using teleop axis values.
00424   //Teleop axes can be mapped to various twist axes, depending on which axes
00425   //the sink object has and which axes the teleop source provides.  Each teleop
00426   //axis is mapped according to the following priority scheme.
00427   //
00428   // ---------------
00429   // teleop -> twist
00430   // ---------------
00431   // LIN_X  -> linear.x (otherwise angular.y or angular.z)
00432   // LIN_Y  -> linear.y (otherwise angular.x or angular.z)
00433   // LIN_Z  -> linear.z (otherwise angular.z)
00434   // ROT_X  -> angular.x (otherwise linear.y or linear.z)
00435   // ROT_Y  -> angular.y (otherwise linear.x or linear.z)
00436   // ROT_Z  -> angular.z (otherwise linear.z)
00437   // ---------------
00438 
00439   //Handle lin X
00440   if (-1 != indexLinX) {
00441     if (mHasLinX) {
00442       twistMsg->linear.x = teleopToTwistLinX(throttle, teleopStateMsg->axes[indexLinX].value);
00443     } else if (mHasRotY && -1 == indexRotY) {
00444       twistMsg->angular.y = teleopToTwistRotY(throttle, teleopStateMsg->axes[indexLinX].value);
00445     } else if (mHasRotZ && -1 == indexRotZ) {
00446       twistMsg->angular.z = teleopToTwistRotZ(throttle, teleopStateMsg->axes[indexLinX].value);
00447     }
00448   }
00449 
00450   //Handle lin Y
00451   if (-1 != indexLinY) {
00452     if (mHasLinY) {
00453       twistMsg->linear.y = teleopToTwistLinY(throttle, teleopStateMsg->axes[indexLinY].value);
00454     } else if (mHasRotX && -1 == indexRotX) {
00455       twistMsg->angular.x = teleopToTwistRotX(throttle, teleopStateMsg->axes[indexLinY].value);
00456     } else if (mHasRotZ && -1 == indexRotZ) {
00457       twistMsg->angular.z = teleopToTwistRotZ(throttle, teleopStateMsg->axes[indexLinY].value);
00458     }
00459   }
00460 
00461   //Handle lin Z
00462   if (-1 != indexLinZ) {
00463     if (mHasLinZ) {
00464       twistMsg->linear.z = teleopToTwistLinZ(throttle, teleopStateMsg->axes[indexLinZ].value);
00465     } else if (mHasRotZ && -1 == indexRotZ) {
00466       twistMsg->angular.z = teleopToTwistRotZ(throttle, teleopStateMsg->axes[indexLinZ].value);
00467     }
00468   }
00469 
00470   //Handle rot X
00471   if (-1 != indexRotX) {
00472     if (mHasRotX) {
00473       twistMsg->angular.x = teleopToTwistRotX(throttle, teleopStateMsg->axes[indexRotX].value);
00474     } else if (mHasLinY && -1 == indexLinY) {
00475       twistMsg->linear.y = teleopToTwistLinY(throttle, teleopStateMsg->axes[indexRotX].value);
00476     } else if (mHasLinZ && -1 == indexLinZ) {
00477       twistMsg->linear.z = teleopToTwistLinZ(throttle, teleopStateMsg->axes[indexRotX].value);
00478     }
00479   }
00480 
00481   //Handle rot Y
00482   if (-1 != indexRotY) {
00483     if (mHasRotY) {
00484       twistMsg->angular.y = teleopToTwistRotY(throttle, teleopStateMsg->axes[indexRotY].value);
00485     } else if (mHasLinX && -1 == indexLinX) {
00486       twistMsg->linear.x = teleopToTwistLinX(throttle, teleopStateMsg->axes[indexRotY].value);
00487     } else if (mHasLinZ && -1 == indexLinZ) {
00488       twistMsg->linear.z = teleopToTwistLinZ(throttle, teleopStateMsg->axes[indexRotY].value);
00489     }
00490   }
00491 
00492   //Handle rot Z
00493   if (-1 != indexRotZ) {
00494     if (mHasRotZ) {
00495       twistMsg->angular.z = teleopToTwistRotZ(throttle, teleopStateMsg->axes[indexRotZ].value);
00496     } else if (mHasLinZ && -1 == indexLinZ) {
00497       twistMsg->linear.z = teleopToTwistLinZ(throttle, teleopStateMsg->axes[indexRotZ].value);
00498     }
00499   }
00500 
00501   //Return result
00502   return true;
00503 }
00504 //=============================================================================
00505 TeleopAxisValue TeleopSinkTwistNode::applyQuadratic(bool enabled, TeleopAxisValue teleopAxisValue) {
00506   if (enabled) {
00507     if (0.0 <= teleopAxisValue) {
00508       return (teleopAxisValue * teleopAxisValue);
00509     } else {
00510       return -(teleopAxisValue * teleopAxisValue);
00511     }
00512   } else {
00513     return teleopAxisValue;
00514   }
00515 }
00516 //=============================================================================
00517 TeleopAxisValue TeleopSinkTwistNode::applyThrottle(bool enabled,
00518                                                            double throttle,
00519                                                            TeleopAxisValue teleopAxisValue) {
00520   if (enabled) {
00521     return (throttle * teleopAxisValue);
00522   } else {
00523     return teleopAxisValue;
00524   }
00525 }
00526 //=============================================================================
00527 double TeleopSinkTwistNode::teleopToTwistLinX(double throttle, TeleopAxisValue teleopAxisValue) {
00528   double level = applyThrottle(mThrottleLinX, throttle, (applyQuadratic(mQuadraticLinX, teleopAxisValue)));
00529   if (0.0 <= teleopAxisValue) {
00530     return level * mMaxLinX;
00531   } else {
00532     return -level * mMinLinX;
00533   }
00534 }
00535 //=============================================================================
00536 double TeleopSinkTwistNode::teleopToTwistLinY(double throttle, TeleopAxisValue teleopAxisValue) {
00537   double level = applyThrottle(mThrottleLinY, throttle, (applyQuadratic(mQuadraticLinY, teleopAxisValue)));
00538   if (0.0 <= teleopAxisValue) {
00539     return level * mMaxLinY;
00540   } else {
00541     return -level * mMinLinY;
00542   }
00543 }
00544 //=============================================================================
00545 double TeleopSinkTwistNode::teleopToTwistLinZ(double throttle, TeleopAxisValue teleopAxisValue) {
00546   double level = applyThrottle(mThrottleLinZ, throttle, (applyQuadratic(mQuadraticLinZ, teleopAxisValue)));
00547   if (0.0 <= teleopAxisValue) {
00548     return level * mMaxLinZ;
00549   } else {
00550     return -level * mMinLinZ;
00551   }
00552 }
00553 //=============================================================================
00554 double TeleopSinkTwistNode::teleopToTwistRotX(double throttle, TeleopAxisValue teleopAxisValue) {
00555   double level = applyThrottle(mThrottleRotX, throttle, (applyQuadratic(mQuadraticRotX, teleopAxisValue)));
00556   if (0.0 <= teleopAxisValue) {
00557     return level * mMaxRotX;
00558   } else {
00559     return -level * mMinRotX;
00560   }
00561 }
00562 //=============================================================================
00563 double TeleopSinkTwistNode::teleopToTwistRotY(double throttle, TeleopAxisValue teleopAxisValue) {
00564   double level = applyThrottle(mThrottleRotY, throttle, (applyQuadratic(mQuadraticRotY, teleopAxisValue)));
00565   if (0.0 <= teleopAxisValue) {
00566     return level * mMaxRotY;
00567   } else {
00568     return -level * mMinRotY;
00569   }
00570 }
00571 //=============================================================================
00572 double TeleopSinkTwistNode::teleopToTwistRotZ(double throttle, TeleopAxisValue teleopAxisValue) {
00573   double level = applyThrottle(mThrottleRotZ, throttle, (applyQuadratic(mQuadraticRotZ, teleopAxisValue)));
00574   if (0.0 <= teleopAxisValue) {
00575     return level * mMaxRotZ;
